replies.message: Good they're taking a step in the right direction, but they still put more plastic in the ocean than any other big business last year! Bit more of a clean up needed!

Hi Paul, it’s clear that recycling rates have stalled and there’s a need to address the issue of recycling and on-the-go littering. We’ll be working with a number of different partners, including Wrap, Keep Britain Tidy, as well as our customers and the Government to continue looking into making it easier to for packaging to be recovered and recycled. We’ll also continue to encourage Government reform of the current producer responsibility system here in Great Britain. Alongside this to increase packaging recovery, we’re also looking into how a well-designed deposit return scheme (DRS) could work in Great Britain.

Coca-Cola good to hear! If all big business make changes and follow through with them, then we can still save the oceans and preserve eco-system that populates them. Hopefully you guys will contribute towards a change for the better
